pERCEPTOR:

Perceptor sent a encodedcom link to Hydras "Master Hydras, the 
hostage is inside our base, she's awakening, I wonder if you desire 
told to her husband that she's our... Guest?? " he said ll those 
words with cruelly and with irony.

OOC: Perceptor has her in Predacon's base, he hadn't set her in a 
cell yet 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@a... wrote:
> OOC:where is nightlight now?
> 
> Hydras sot upwards when hesaw rodimus flip missing Carnatron's 
shots. he

performing a front

also pass by

extends his body,
